column4: I want sun's jre 7 on lucid.  Is there a way with apt, or have I got to grab Oracle's binary?
read that link in that message from ubottu

zykotick9 : http://askubuntu.com/questions/56104/how-can-i-install-oracle-java-jre-7  I'm there but the update-alternatives --config java is giving me "update-alternatives: error: no alternatives for java."
you're probably not reading the right spot then
